definitions.definition: An item of furniture used to sit on or in, comprising a seat , legs or wheels, back, and sometimes arm rests, for use by one person.
examples: All I need to weather a snowstorm is hot coffee, a warm fire, a good book and a comfortable chair .

main_definition: An item of furniture used to sit on or in, comprising a seat , legs or wheels, back, and sometimes arm rests, for use by one person.
